text: this is jimmy wang reporting from
beijing the letter m on these cartons of
milk is one of the chief reasons tens of
thousands of Chinese infants have fallen
sick due to milk contaminated with the
industrial chemical melamine it is a
stamp of approval given by Chinese
regulatory authorities that certifies a
list of products deemed to be of high
quality just last week Chinese
authorities scrap this standard in the
wake of the milk scandal but although
authorities have recalled the tainted
milk not all of it has been taken off
store shelves leaving Chinese consumers
both angry and concern about where to
turn these big dairy brand names were on
the country's quality inspection exempt
list people bought them because they had
the government seal of approval but now
look at all the problems i think the
heads of these dairy companies don't
have any conscience whatsoever baby
hasn't drunk any contaminated milk but
many of my close friends babies has
hecho Jones 15 month old grandson is
sick from drinking milk contaminated
with Melanie this brand is supposed to
be one of the country's most reputable
brands it's on the government's list we
followed the list and look where we
ended up the government is to blame for
not inspecting the milk thoroughly and
the companies are at fault for greedily
pursuing profit without any morals and
the doctors they should give us
direction on this oh noes how do we cure
it how do we tell if they're getting
better or worse they don't tell us
anything if our baby has health problems
in the future as a result of this who
will be held accountable
